name: TokenVesting
description: TokenVesting. A token holder contract that can release its token balance gradually like a typical vesting scheme, with a cliff and vesting period. Optionally revocable by the owner.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

eventDecorators.name: Released
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

eventDecorators.name: Revoked
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a Bank's capital is rebalanced.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Creates a vesting contract that vests its balance of any ERC20 token to the _beneficiary, gradually in a linear fashion until _start + _duration. By then all of the balance will have vested.

parameterDecorators.name: _beneficiary
parameterDecorators.description: address of the beneficiary to whom vested tokens are transferred.

parameterDecorators.name: _start
parameterDecorators.description: the time (as Unix time) at which point vesting starts.

parameterDecorators.name: _cliff
parameterDecorators.description: duration in seconds of the cliff in which tokens will begin to vest.

parameterDecorators.name: _duration
parameterDecorators.description: duration in seconds of the period in which the tokens will vest.

parameterDecorators.name: _revocable
parameterDecorators.description: whether the vesting is revocable or not.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: releasableAmount
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the amount that has already vested but hasn't been released yet.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: ERC20 token which is being vested.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: ERC20 token which is being vested.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: revoke
functionDecorators.description: Allows the owner to revoke the vesting. Tokens already vested remain in the contract, the rest are returned to the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: ERC20 token which is being vested.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: vestedAmount
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the amount that has already vested.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: ERC20 token which is being vested.
